text: Apasovo () is a rural locality (a village) in Aptrakovsky Selsoviet, Meleuzovsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 68 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located 17 km from Meleuz, 5 km from Aptrakovo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Meleuzovsky District
title: Apasovo
